main event: Three circular objects, yellowish-white in color, were observed moving in formation at approximately 500 mph for about 30 seconds.
interesting points: The objects appeared at 2 P-85's from and were in a westerly direction.
The military/ADC INT AFP CCIO and other agencies were notified of the sighting.
Pilots reported seeing a bright light at the same time as the civilian observer's sighting.
Possible explanations considered were a weather balloon, a shooting star, or Northern Lights reflecting off a balloon.
No physical evidence or photographs were reported.
witnesses: civilian observer, Buffalo control tower operator, U.S. weather forecaster
